text: Karl Schirra (16 October 1928 – 12 September 2010) was a German footballer who played for Borussia Neunkirchen, 1. FC Saarbrücken and the Saarland national team as a forward. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2010 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:Saarland B international footballers Category:Borussia Neunkirchen players Category:1. FC Saarbrücken players Category:Association football forwards
title: Karl Schirra
